attributes.action: Abandon the 2012 London Olympics and return them to the IOC for reassignmnet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost is now an unjustifiable £14 billion and rising compared to the £4 billion originally estimated. This extra hit on the taxpayer (and the National Lottery good causes) will come at a time of growing economic difficulty, reducing public services and high taxes as the current problems unwind. We are going to be humiliated anyway so let's minimise the cost.
